<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107757</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107757</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202693</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Understanding the Elements of a Story</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verstehen der Elemente einer Geschichte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arrangement les éléments d'une histoire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreendendo os elementos de uma história</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Capire gli elementi di una storia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατανόηση των στοιχείων μιας ιστορίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Entender los elementos de una historia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will read a story, understand the elements of the story, analyze characters, and complete research about good and evil.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer lesen eine Geschichte, verstehen 
die Elemente der Geschichte, analysieren Zeichen und führen Forschung
über gutes und schlechtes durch.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants liront une histoire, comprendront 
les éléments de l'histoire, analyseront des caractères, et 
termineront la recherche au sujet de bon et de mauvais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes lerão uma história, compreenderão
os elementos da história, analisarão caráteres, e terminarão a 
pesquisa sobre bom e evil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi leggeranno una storia, capiranno gli 
elementi della storia, analizzeranno i caratteri e completeranno la 
ricerca circa buon e diabolico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα διαβάσουν μια ιστορία, θα καταλάβουν 
τα στοιχεία της ιστορίας, θα αναλύσουν τους χαρακτήρες, και την 
πλήρη έρευνα για καλός και κακός.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes leerán una historia, entenderán 
los elementos de la historia, analizarán caracteres, y terminarán la
investigación sobre bueno y malvado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107757</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
